overview: David developed and invested several successful ventures, including clubefashion.com, a private online sales club in Portugal. He managed Business Development for Sony BMG Latin (Latin America and US Latin) from Miami where he was responsible for the digital business both online and mobile, executing some of the largest worldwide deals in the company. Previously, he was a strategy consultant for Roland Berger in Milan and Madrid. MBA Degree University of Virginia (Darden); wide international experience (lived in 8 countries, and is fluent in 5 languages). Currently David is the CEO of Digital Luxury a company that invests and develops fashion and lifestyle ecommerce with a strong focus in Latin America. Davis is the acting CEO of HiPXiK.com the leading online sales club in Mexico and entering Brasil. He lives between Brasil and Mexico.
